title: Asymptotic distribution of critical transmission radius for greedy forward routing.
abstract: Consider a random multihop wireless network represented by a Poisson point process over a unit-area disk with mean n. Let o n  denote its critical transmission radius for its greedy forward routing. Recently, asymptotic bounds on o n  have been progressively improved. However, the precise asymptotic probability distribution of o n  remains open. In this paper, we settle this open problem. Specifically, let σ = 2π over 3 − √3 over 2. Then for any constant c, the asymptotic probability of equation is proved to be exactly exp (equation).
